activities.name: helloword
activities.description: fuzzy join: atc 2020 2021 and  atc affectation

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Client as string,
		BrandID as string,
		{Code Postal} as string,
		Nom as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> clientEHS
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sap
sap select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Org# commerciale} = {Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, renamecols union(byName: true)~> Union1
clientEHS select(mapColumn(
		Client,
		{Org# commerciale} = BrandID,
		{Code postal} = {Code Postal},
		Nom
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamecols
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unionClientSapEHS'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sapUnionEHS

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as integer,
		{Canal distribution} as integer,
		{Secteur d'activité} as integer,
		{Document de vente} as integer,
		Poste as integer,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as integer,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as integer,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as double,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as integer,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as float,
		{CA cdé} as float,
		{Qté livrée} as float,
		{CA livré} as float,
		{Qté facturée} as float,
		{CA facturé} as float,
		{Cout standard cdé} as float,
		{Cout fabrication} as float,
		{Cout standard livré} as float,
		{Cout standard facturé} as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturation
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
Select3 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
facturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 derive(join = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2 join(DerivedColumn1@join == DerivedColumn2@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6 derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
Select7, addperiod union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
facturation derive(test = toString({CA facturé})) ~> DerivedColumn3
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

properties.description: flux pour le retraitmenet des ecoulements du modele dsc-tereva

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		marque_file as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque_id as string,
		marque as string,
		Client as string,
		{code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		{Code produit} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Clé} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		Depot as string,
		NoFrs as string,
		FOUR2 as string,
		C_Four as string,
		Lib_Four as string,
		Categorie as string,
		Canal as string,
		Financement as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		Date_Debut as string,
		Date_Fin as string,
		NoArtDSC as string,
		LibArt as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		{LIB AGENCE} as string,
		{Qté_Ini} as string,
		Solde_Qte as string,
		Qte_Tot as string,
		Qte_Retenue as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		NomCli as string,
		PRR as string,
		PRS_ligne_BL as string,
		PA_Ref as string,
		PA_D as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Ecart as string,
		Aide as string,
		Aide_Retenue as string,
		{Aide_Validée_VGF} as string,
		Date_Num as string,
		P_Fact as string,
		{Clé_Offre_Article} as string,
		Motif_Commentaire as string,
		{Qté_Campagne} as string,
		Prix_Campagne as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		Montant_Avoir as string,
		NoDocRefac as string,
		NoLigneDocRefac as string,
		{Contrôle} as string,
		Date_Ctrl as string,
		Code_Motif_Refus as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		{ValidéPar} as string,
		DateAjout as string,
		{ID ATC} as string,
		{Nom ATC} as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		{Nouveau Prix vente unitaire} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> avoir
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salerDSC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrgaTerevas
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
Select1 derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement ))) ~> EccAddToReplicate
DerivedColumn1 split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select2, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 window(over(yearmonth,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten2 window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn6
Flatten3 window(over(yearmonth,
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
DerivedColumn6 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn7
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn8
Window1 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn9
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outEccDscTereva.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outEccDscTereva
positiveQuantite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,

		DateOffre as string,
		{Référence} as string,

Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
selectAvoir, organisaation join(selectAvoir@HubSAPid == organisaation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Facturation, organisaation join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
Select1 derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Récept. de march.},
		reference = Article,
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
Join2 derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn1
mapCanalID, efacturation join({Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year),
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRight
typeCast select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid = selectAvoir@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
fullLeft filter(isNull(efacturation@tOrigin)) ~> left
left derive(data_origin = "avoir",
		id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		POSSAMidString = NoCli,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
fullRight filter(isNull(mapCanalID@tOrigin)) ~> right
right select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final = {Canal distribution},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference = efacturation@reference,
		yearmonth = efacturation@yearmonth,
		HubSAPid = efacturation@HubSAPid,
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		ca_final = {CA facturé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(data_origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn3
inner select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,
		yearmonth = Select1@yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 aggregate(groupBy(reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid),
	ca_final = first(ca_final),
		NoOffre = max(NoOffre),
		qt_final = max(qt_final),
		canal = max(canal),
		id_canal_final = max(id_canal_final),
		{ATC Corrigé} = max({ATC Corrigé}),
		marque_id = max(marque_id),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		{Donneur d ordre} = max({Donneur d ordre})) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endInner
Aggregate1 derive(data_origin = "facturation avoir") ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString,
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		qt_final,
		ca_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endRight
addDataorigin select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference,
		qt_final,
		POSSAMidString,
		ca_final,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endLeft
DerivedColumn5, endRight union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		NoOffre,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5, endLeft union(byName: true)~> Union2
DerivedColumn6 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDerementaiton
endInner derive(id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn5
Union2 select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
REFATC aggregate(groupBy(Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc),
	Matricule = max(Matricule),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		ATC = max(ATC)) ~> Agregat
Agregat select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectcolonneATC
Offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		Canal,
		NbLogement,
		Produit,
		{Numéro interne 2},
		{Créateur offre},
		Source,
		UserLowerCase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColonneOffre
SelectColonneOffre aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		Canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> AgregatOffreCanalATC
AgregatOffreCanalATC select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		canal = Canal,
		{ATC performance} = ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOffre
endDerementaiton derive(canal_final = iif(id_canal_final=="43", "Chantier",  "Diffus")) ~> canalfinal
canalfinal select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selec
ExtarctionSAP select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Téléphone 1},
		{Numéro de télécopie},
		{Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSAP
Selec, SelectSAP join(POSSAMidString == Client
	&& marque_id == {Org. commerciale},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSAP
JoinSAP derive(marque_name = iif(marque_id=="1604", 'SaunierDuval', 'Vaillant'),
		distributeur = "van markes") ~> marqueNamee
marqueNamee select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Téléphone 1},
		{Numéro de télécopie},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCol
SelectCol, SelectcolonneATC join(canal_final == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& marque_name == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinATC
Select2 derive(data_origin = "avoir") ~> addDataorigin
JoinATC select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Donneur d ordre},
		{Document de vente},
		data_origin,
		NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameATC
RenameATC, SelectOffre join(NoOffre == Offre,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOffre
JoinOffre select(mapColumn(
		reference,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		marque_id,
		POSSAMidString,
		data_origin,
		no_offre = NoOffre,
		canal_final,
		{Code postal},
		{Org. commerciale},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameNoOffre
Select6 derive(distributeur = "Van Markes") ~> DerivedColumn6
organisaation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SVanMarkes.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieVanMarkes
endDerementaiton sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['OutpoutVanMarkes'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputVanMarkes
renameNoOffre sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SinkVanMarkes'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SinkVanMarkes
